sentence.Network_en: Some communicable diseases are transmitted only through the agency of insects.
sentence.Network_cn: 某些传染病只通过昆虫来传播.

sentence.Network_en: Some communicable diseases are transmitted only through the agency of vermin or insects.
sentence.Network_cn: 某些传染病只通过害虫和昆虫来传播.

sentence.Network_en: Communicable diseases have been a curse of mankind since time immemorial.
sentence.Network_cn: 自古以来,某些传染性疾病就是人类的灾祸.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'communicating, having communication'): from Old French, from late Latin communicabilis, from the verb communicare 'to share' (see communicate)

entry.def: A communicable disease is one that can be passed on to other people.

means.word_mean: 1. (of disease) capable of being transmitted by infection
